page.title: 02Fawn-tagging at Margam Park
page.content: J3Y and Clase went to Margam park in a coach.When we stopped we got out of the coach and put on our wellingtons. We started to go through the bracken. There were lots of grass snakes.I thought I saw an adder.Then I saw a fawn and I ran after it through the boggy part and I was soaking. Then Cyrelle and I went into the bush and saw the baby fawn.Then we all went deeper into the heart of Margam Park.A girl found a 3 day old fawn which was beautiful and very frightened, with the most lovely birthmarks I have ever seen. We went deeper and deeper into the heart of Margam and found 2 other fawns. Every fawn we found had its ear tagged with a red tag to say that it was born in 1985.When each fawn was tagged it gave a high-pitched squeal.Then we had lunch with Clase school.Victoria Moore
